item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-03-16
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at American Craft (1700 Beacon St, Williston Rd., Brookline). #
  • American Craft on #Yelp: Wow they just can't do food at this place. We decided to visit for the first time after the... #
  • RT: by @cambridgechron: NEWS: Breathable chocolate debuts in Harvard Square (via @02138now) #
  • Looks like @quantcast is broken, hasn't been updated in nearly a week. #
  • The book trailer for Dawn of the Dreadfuls, Steve Hockensmithâ€™s prequel to Pride and Prejudice and Zombies - @gammasquad #
  • I'm at Panera Bread (1100 Lexington St., Waltham). #
  • Thinking about moving a db table from MyISAM to INNODB, what's the best tool to test the differences? #lazyweb #
